text.__SUMMARY__:
Allium curtum is a Middle Eastern species of onion in the amaryllis family.Plant is a bulb-forming perennial producing a tight, head-like umbel of green or purple flowers.
Subspecies acceptedAllium curtum subsp. curtum - Egypt incl Sinai, Israel, Palestine, Jordan, Lebanon, Syria, Turkey, Cyprus
Allium curtum subsp. palaestinum Feinbrun - Rafah region in northeastern Sinai
